# storagegrid_bucket_versioning (Data Source)

Fetch the bucket configuration for object versioning of the named bucket.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket_name` (String) The name of the bucket to fetch versioning configuration for.

### Read-Only

- `status` (String) The status of versioning for the bucket. Is either 'Enabled', 'Suspended' or Disabled.
